Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.name: Representation
Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.abstract: A protocol for any kind of encoded information.

Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization0.name: Serialization
Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization0.abstract: This protocol provides a blueprint for a serialization class.

Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.name: ErrorEncoder
Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.abstract: An Encoder that returns an ErrorContainer in all methods.

Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.name: ErrorContainer
Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.abstract: A keyed, unkeyed, single value container and encoder that will throw an error in all methods it can throw and return another KeyedErrorContainer in all other methods.

Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.name: DirectlyCodable
Typealiases.html#/s:17MetaSerialization1.abstract: implement this protocol if a type is supported directly by the Translator and you won’t have to write any code for coding.

Structs/UnkeyedContainerElementReference.name: init(referencing:at:)
Structs/UnkeyedContainerElementReference.abstract: Inits a new unkeyed container element reference.

Structs/KeyedContainerElementReference.h.name: init(referencing:at:)
Structs/KeyedContainerElementReference.h.abstract: Inits a new keyed container element reference.

Structs/KeyedErrorContainer.html#/s:17Me.name: init(error:codingPath:userInfo:)
Structs/KeyedErrorContainer.html#/s:17Me.abstract: Initalize a new KeyedErrorContainer with the given error, coding path and user info dictionary.

Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.name: alreadyStoringValueAtThisCodingPath
Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.abstract: Thrown if there’s already a value stored a the given path.

Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.name: pathNotFilled
Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.abstract: Thrown if a meta was tried to be inserted for a coding path with more than one new key.

Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.name: noMetaStoredAtThisCodingPath
Structs/CodingStorageError/Reason.html#/.abstract: Thrown if no meta is stored at the requested coding path.

Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.name: init(intValue:)
Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.abstract: construct a new IndexCodingKey by passing an index.

Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.name: stringValue
Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.abstract: will return the index as string value

Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.name: init(stringValue:)
Structs/IndexCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSer.abstract: constructs a new IndexCodingKey from the given sting, that needs to be base 10 encoded intenger representation.

Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.name: stringValue
Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.abstract: The string value of a coding key

Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.name: intValue
Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.abstract: The int value of a coding key

Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.name: init(codingKey:)
Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.abstract: Initalizes stringValue and intValue with the string and int values of codingKey

Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.name: init(stringValue:intValue:)
Structs/MetaCodingKey.html#/s:17MetaSeri.abstract: Initalizes with the given string and int value. The intValue is nil by default.

Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator/Primiti.name: init(from:)
Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator/Primiti.abstract: Creates a new Primitive for the given type if it matches one of this enums cases.

Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator/Primiti.name: Primitive
Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator/Primiti.abstract: This enum contains cases for all primitive types PrimitivesEnumTranslator can handle.

Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator.html.name: PrimitivesEnumTranslator
Structs/PrimitivesEnumTranslator.html.abstract: A implementation of MetaSupplier and Unwrapper that gets Metas out of your way, so you will only have to work with Arrays, Dictionarys and the Primitive types you pass to it.

Structs/MetaCodingKey.html.name: MetaCodingKey
Structs/MetaCodingKey.html.abstract: A wrapper struct around arbitrary coding keys.

Structs/PrimitivesProtocolTranslator.htm.name: PrimitivesProtocolTranslator
Structs/PrimitivesProtocolTranslator.htm.abstract: This MetaSupplier and Unwrapper implementation provides an easy way to use MetaSerialization.

Structs/IndexCodingKey.html.name: IndexCodingKey
Structs/IndexCodingKey.html.abstract: A special coding key represents an index in an unkeyed container

Structs/StandardCodingKey.html.name: StandardCodingKey
Structs/StandardCodingKey.html.abstract: A CodingKey type initalizable with any string or int value.

Structs/NilMarker.html.name: NilMarker
Structs/NilMarker.html.abstract: Represents a nil value independant of the Optionals generic Wrapped parameter.

Structs/KeyedErrorContainer.html.name: KeyedErrorContainer
Structs/KeyedErrorContainer.html.abstract: A keyed, unkeyed, single value container and encoder that will throw an error in all methods it can throw and return another KeyedErrorContainer in all other methods.

Structs/KeyedContainerElementReference.h.name: KeyedContainerElementReference
Structs/KeyedContainerElementReference.h.abstract: References an element in any keyed container meta. This meta may be in the storage of another container or directly on the stack.

Structs/UnkeyedContainerElementReference.name: UnkeyedContainerElementReference
Structs/UnkeyedContainerElementReference.abstract: References an element in any unkeyed container meta. This meta may be in the storage of another container or directly on the stack.

Protocols/DecodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.name: numberOfMetasIfKnown
Protocols/DecodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.abstract: The number of metas in the container, if this number is known.

Protocols/DecodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.name: get(at:)
Protocols/DecodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.abstract: Returns the element at the given index

Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.name: numberOfMetas
Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.abstract: The number of elements in the container ( 0 if no element is contained).

Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.name: get(at:)
Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.abstract: Returns the element at the given index

Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.name: insert(_:at:)
Protocols/EncodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.h.abstract: Inserts or appends the given meta at index.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Accesses the meta at the given coding path.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: storesMeta(at:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Returns whether a meta is stored at the coding path.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: store(meta:at:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Stores a new meta at the coding path.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: storePlaceholder(at:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Store a placeholder at the coding path.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: remove(at:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Remove the meta at the given coding path.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.name: fork(at:)
Protocols/CodingStorage.html#/s:17MetaSe.abstract: Return a CodingStoreage an new (super) encoder/decoder can work on.

Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: getValue(for:)
Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: Returns the value contained for key in this container or nil if no value is contained. If contains returned true, you needs to return a non-nil value here.

Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: allKeys
Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: Returns all keys in this container as MetaCodingKey.

Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: contains(key:)
Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: returns whether key is contained in this container.

Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: put(_:for:)
Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: Stores value for key (replaces the old value if there is already a value stored for key).

Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: getValue(for:)
Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: Returns the value contained for key in this container or nil if no value is contained. If contains returned true, you needs to return a non-nil value here.

Protocols/Unwrapper.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: unwrap(meta:toType:for:)
Protocols/Unwrapper.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Extracts a swift value of type T from a Meta you passed as part of a meta tree to a MetaDecoder.

Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html#/s:17.name: Raw
Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html#/s:17.abstract: the raw type you encode to and decode from, for example Data

Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html#/s:17.name: decode(toType:from:)
Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html#/s:17.abstract: decodes a value of the given type from a raw representation

Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html#/s:17.name: Raw
Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html#/s:17.abstract: the raw type you encode to and decode from, for example Data

Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html#/s:17.name: encode(_:)
Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html#/s:17.abstract: encodes the given value into a raw representation

Protocols/MetaSupplier.html#/s:17MetaSer.name: wrap(_:for:)
Protocols/MetaSupplier.html#/s:17MetaSer.abstract: Creates, sets and returns a Meta for the given value, or returns nil if the value is not supported, respectively can not be represented in your underlying format.

Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html#/s.name: decode(type:)
Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html#/s.abstract: Decodes a value of the given type from this representation

Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html#/s.name: convert()
Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html#/s.abstract: construct a meta tree from this instance that can be used by a decoder returned from provideNewDecoder.

Protocols/EncodingRepresentation.html#/s.name: init(meta:)
Protocols/EncodingRepresentation.html#/s.abstract: construct an instance of this type from a meta tree, created by an encoder returned from provideNewEncoder.

Protocols/EncodingRepresentation.html.name: EncodingRepresentation
Protocols/EncodingRepresentation.html.abstract: A protocol for encoded data that will only be written.

Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html.name: DecodingRepresentation
Protocols/DecodingRepresentation.html.abstract: A protocol for encoded data that will only be read.

Protocols.html#/s:17MetaSerialization03N.name: NilMeta
Protocols.html#/s:17MetaSerialization03N.abstract: Protocol for metas indicating null/nil or no value contained.

Protocols/MetaSupplier.html.name: MetaSupplier
Protocols/MetaSupplier.html.abstract: The core interface to specify MetaEncoder’s encoding.

Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html.name: IntermediateEncoder
Protocols/IntermediateEncoder.html.abstract: This protocol provides a blueprint for an intermediate encoder, that does simply delegate the task of encoding to a Encoder.

Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html.name: IntermediateDecoder
Protocols/IntermediateDecoder.html.abstract: This protocol provides a blueprint for an intermediate decoder, that does simply delegate the task of decoding to a Decoder.

Protocols/Unwrapper.html.name: Unwrapper
Protocols/Unwrapper.html.abstract: The core interface to specify MetaDecoder’s decoding.

Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: EncodingKeyedContainerMeta
Protocols/EncodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: A meta for a keyed collection of metas during encoding.

Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.name: DecodingKeyedContainerMeta
Protocols/DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.htm.abstract: A meta for a keyed collection of metas during decoding.

Protocols/CodingStorage.html.name: CodingStorage
Protocols/CodingStorage.html.abstract: CodingStorage is the central storing unit used by MetaEncoder as well as MetaDecoder.

Protocols/ContainerElementReference.html.name: ContainerElementReference
Protocols/ContainerElementReference.html.abstract: References a value inside another container meta.

Protocols/DirectlyDecodable.html.name: DirectlyDecodable
Protocols/DirectlyDecodable.html.abstract: Implement this protocol if a type is supported directly by the Translator.

Protocols/DirectlyEncodable.html.name: DirectlyEncodable
Protocols/DirectlyEncodable.html.abstract: Implement this protocol if a type is supported directly by the Translator.

Enums/Reference.html#/s:17MetaSerializat.name: direct
Enums/Reference.html#/s:17MetaSerializat.abstract: A reference directly to the coding storage

Enums/Reference.html#/s:17MetaSerializat.name: containerElement
Enums/Reference.html#/s:17MetaSerializat.abstract: A reference to an element inside another container.

Enums/SpecialCodingKey.html.name: SpecialCodingKey
Enums/SpecialCodingKey.html.abstract: An enumeration of all special coding keys meta-serialization will use

Enums/Reference.html.name: Reference
Enums/Reference.html.abstract: A reference to some meta, eigther on the storage, or inside another container meta.

Classes/MetaUnkeyedEncodingContainer.htm.name: createCodingKey(for:)
Classes/MetaUnkeyedEncodingContainer.htm.abstract: create a coding key for the given index

Classes/MetaUnkeyedEncodingContainer.htm.name: createElementReference(for:)
Classes/MetaUnkeyedEncodingContainer.htm.abstract: Create a new reference for the element at the given index.

Classes/MetaKeyedDecodingContainer.html#.name: accessMeta(at:)
Classes/MetaKeyedDecodingContainer.html#.abstract: An utility mathod that acesses the meta stored at key and throws an error, if the value isn’t present.

Classes/ReferencingCodingStorage.html#/s.name: init(referencing:delegatingTo:at:)
Classes/ReferencingCodingStorage.html#/s.abstract: Creates a new ReferencingCodingStorage for base path that writes back to the given reference and uses storage as underlying delegate.

Classes/MetaUnkeyedDecodingContainer.htm.name: currentCodingKey
Classes/MetaUnkeyedDecodingContainer.htm.abstract: An utility computed property, that returns a coding key for the current index.

Classes/MetaUnkeyedDecodingContainer.htm.name: accessMetaAtCurrentIndex()
Classes/MetaUnkeyedDecodingContainer.htm.abstract: An utility method that accesses the meta stored at the current index and throws an error, if not value is present.

Classes/MetaDecoder/Errors.html#/s:17Met.name: decodingHasNotSucceeded
Classes/MetaDecoder/Errors.html#/s:17Met.abstract: Thrown if the decoding process hasn’t succeeded.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: storage
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: A StorageAccessor to this decoder’s private storage

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: init(at:with:unwrapper:storage:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Initalizes a new MetaDecoder with the given values.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: unwrap(_:toType:for:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Unwraps a meta to a real value using translator.unwrap and calling type.init if translator.unwrap returned nil.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: representsNil(meta:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Checks whether the given meta represents a nil meta. Tries to dynamically unwrap meta if specified.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: container(keyedBy:for:at:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Create a new KeyedDecodingContainer for the given meta, if it is a DecodingKeyedContainerMeta.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: unkeyedContainer(for:at:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Create a new UnkeyedDecodingContainer for the given meta, if it is a DecodingUnkeyedContainerMeta.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: singleValueContainer(for:at:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Create a new SingleValueDecodingContainer for the given meta.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: decoder(for:at:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Creates a new decoder that decodes the given meta. This decoder can for example be used as super decoder.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: decoderImplementation(storage:at:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Creates a new decoder with the given storage.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: decode(type:from:)
Classes/MetaDecoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Decodes a value of type D from the given meta tree.

Classes/MetaKeyedEncodingContainer.html#.name: createElementReference(for:)
Classes/MetaKeyedEncodingContainer.html#.abstract: Create a new reference for the element at the given coding key.

Classes/MetaEncoder/Errors.html#/s:17Met.name: encodingHasNotSucceeded
Classes/MetaEncoder/Errors.html#/s:17Met.abstract: Thrown if the encoding process hasn’t succeeded.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: metaSupplier
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: The translator used to get and finally translate Metas

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: init(at:with:metaSupplier:storage:)
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Initalizes a new MetaEncoder with the given values.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: wrap(_:at:)
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Wraps a value to a meta using translator.wrap and calling value.encode if translator.wrapreturned nil.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: encoder(referencing:at:)
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Creates a new encoder that encodes to the given reference. This encoder can for example be used as super encoder.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: encoderImplementation(storage:at:)
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Creates a new encoder with the given storage.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.name: encode(_:)
Classes/MetaEncoder.html#/s:17MetaSerial.abstract: Encodes the given value to a meta tree.

Classes/MetaEncoder.html.name: MetaEncoder
Classes/MetaEncoder.html.abstract: An Encoder that constucts a Meta instead of encoding to a concrete format.

Classes/MetaDecoder.html.name: MetaDecoder
Classes/MetaDecoder.html.abstract: A Decoder that decodes from a Meta instead from a concrete format.

Classes/MetaSingleValueDecodingContainer.name: MetaSingleValueDecodingContainer
Classes/MetaSingleValueDecodingContainer.abstract: Manages all kinds of metas, that represent some kind of single value

Classes/SimpleSerialization.html.name: SimpleSerialization
Classes/SimpleSerialization.html.abstract: Provides a simple Serialization class, you pass a translator in initalization.

Classes/ReferencingCodingStorage.html.name: ReferencingCodingStorage
Classes/ReferencingCodingStorage.html.abstract: A CodingStorage that writes the meta on it’s base path back to another storage.

Classes/LinearCodingStack.html.name: LinearCodingStack
Classes/LinearCodingStack.html.abstract: A CodingStorage that stores it’s metas on a stack.

Classes/MetaSingleValueEncodingContainer.name: MetaSingleValueEncodingContainer
Classes/MetaSingleValueEncodingContainer.abstract: Manages all kinds of metas, that represent some kind of single value

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
